ass_menu_is_massive_desc: Make the mod do the thing.
ass_menu_level_mod_desc: Make levels use a fixed response faction on any difficulty.
ass_menu_level_mod_map_desc: Change which level has which Level Mod when using "Per-Level" setting.
ass_menu_assault_style_desc: Choose between original styled and Streamlined Heisting styled spawn groups.
ass_menu_skill_desc: Tweaks base values used for scaling.
ass_menu_intensity_desc: Forces certain scaling values to the maximum.
ass_menu_minigun_dozers_desc: Allow Minigun Dozers to spawn on Death Wish difficulty.
ass_menu_reset_settings_desc: Reset settings to the default for the next heist. Does not affect Level Mod Map.
ass_menu_reset_level_mod_map_desc: Reset Level Mod Map to the default for the next heist. Does not affect settings.
ass_menu_verify: Are you sure you want to do this?
ass_menu_verify_reset_settings: Are you sure you want to reset your settings?
ass_menu_verify_reset_level_mod_map: Are you sure you want to reset the Level Mod Map?
ass_menu_did_not_find_sh:
Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups requires Streamlined Heisting.

Alarmingly Streamlined Spawngroups will deactivate itself until Streamlined Heisting is installed and the game is fully restarted.
